Sentencas: Doped cerium oxide (CeO2) based electrolytes are attractive alternative materials to replace the existing yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) used as electrolyte for SOFC (solid oxide fuel cells).
Titulo: Inductively coupled plasma synthesis of CeO2-based powders from liquid solutions for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Cerium oxide electrolytes offer a similar performance to YSZ electrolytes at a lower cell operating temperature (similar to600-800 degreesC), therefore reducing thermal stresses and solid state reactions among the cell components.
Titulo: Inductively coupled plasma synthesis of CeO2-based powders from liquid solutions for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Doped Ce1- xMexO2-x/2 (Me = Gd, Sm or Y) fine powders were synthesized from nitrate salts dissolved in water using a radio frequency inductively coupled plasma reactor.
Titulo: Inductively coupled plasma synthesis of CeO2-based powders from liquid solutions for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: It was demonstrated that the relative concentrations of Ce and dopants fed in the solutions were retained in the synthesized powders.
Titulo: Inductively coupled plasma synthesis of CeO2-based powders from liquid solutions for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: The products were all nano-crystalline with the basic crystal structure of CeO2 and the crystal size of the products was essentially independent of the dopant used.
Titulo: Inductively coupled plasma synthesis of CeO2-based powders from liquid solutions for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: The particle size distributions obtained were multimodal and in most cases trimodal.
Titulo: Inductively coupled plasma synthesis of CeO2-based powders from liquid solutions for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: The results obtained differ from a previously reported mechanism of particle synthesis from liquid precursors.
Titulo: Inductively coupled plasma synthesis of CeO2-based powders from liquid solutions for SOFC electrolytes
